virtual UInt_t ORVDigitizerDecoder::GetEventWaveformPoint ( size_t  event,
size_t  waveformPoint 
) [pure virtual]

Gets a point in the waveform.

One can mask this this off to reduce the size of the data using GetBitResolution(). e.g. 

           UInt_t mask = 0x1; size_t i=1; 
           while (i<GetBitResolution()) { mask <<= 1; mask += 1; i++; }

Implemented in ORAcqirisDC440Decoder, ORDGF4cEventDecoder, ORGretaDecoder, ORGretaMarkIVDecoder, ORKatrinFLTWaveformDecoder, and ORMCA927Decoder.

virtual size_t ORVDigitizerDecoder::GetNumberOfEvents (  )  [pure virtual]

It is possible to have more than one event in a record.
